good morning everyone... from all the requests, we are going to re-open normal hours on Mondays :-) Just in time for the Bears game! happy christmas eve eve to all our tweeps,  hope everyone's finished their holiday shopping! we're open tomorrow during the day! who wants a $4.50 Black & Tan to warm you up in this crappy chicago winter weather??? become our fan on facebook ;-) http://bit.ly/8RXSDf we're revising our beer list this week :-) super excited to get some new stuff in like woodchuck hard cider and leinekugals red we're putting up christmas decorations today!!!! but you'll have to wait til tomorrow to see them :-) Oh! and join us for @blackwednesday for lots of specials and $5 Skyy Infusion Martinis :-) what a way to stretch that stomach for Thursday! in case you haven't heard... we are now going to be closed on Mondays :-( we'll see you tomorrow!! if ur not spending your Friday waiting in line for #newmoon today...come test your talents at our all-you-can-eat Catfish Fry... only $9.95! wanna help a local team AND enjoy an open bar? $35 gets you a wristband... proceeds go towards Happy Endings softball team :-) 8 PM 2nite!!! #musicmonday we're trying to find some new tunes... we're not liking our current internet radio situation. any suggestions?? oh! and we gave away the Heineken Beertener personal tapper this weekend too! the lucky winner will be receiving her prize this week ;-) exhausted from a big weekend! halloween party, bears' triumphant bounceback, way too much candy.... ready to relax & enjoy early november :) oh and we put together all the raffle prizes and costume contest prizes last night.... they're good! it took all my energy not to steal 0:-) any suburbanites w/o plans for 2mrw night? come chill with us! we're making all the jello shots today in preparation for the festivities!!! Happy Hump Day everyone! we're putting the finishing touches on our Halloween decorations today and really excited for our party on Sat!!! #musicmonday best Halloween song? obvious choice is Thriller but every1 always forgets about One Eyed One Horned Flying Purple People Eater gettin' hyped up for our Halloween Bash? We are too.  Every1 have their costume figured out? We're still putting the finishing touches on... did we mention you get to KEEP the glass!? AND get entered to win the supa fly Sayers jersey hangin' on the wall? Can't get any better :-) movin' on- game day today is the LAST day for the limited edition Gale Sayers #40 collectors glass! $4 Miller Pints & $2 refills Shogun was robbed! #UFC was totally rigged! Machida got annihilated out there! I give up on any mixed martial arts competitions.... Happy Weekend to all of our tweeps :-) gotta go get ready for the #UFC 104 tonight, my votes on Shogun!!!! @SgtTommysKids thanks for the follow! sounds like an amazing organization, we look forward to hearing about your great work :-) :-) @dbsalk thanks for the follow as well :-) west suburbs are worth a trip :-) cute little downtowns all along the bnsf! @teriobrien congrats on your upcoming show! good luck! we'll be sending our good vibes to you.  we'll try to listen in too :-)
